attributes.name: Health Journal
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Health Journal card for daily wellness tracking and health management in the Boxel framework. This card should enable users to monitor physical health, mental wellbeing, medications, symptoms, and lifestyle factors while providing insights to improve overall health outcomes.

## Core Fields

### Journal Entry
- **entryDate**: DateField - Journal entry date
- **entryTime**: TimeField - Time of entry
- **overallFeeling**: NumberField - Wellness scale 1-10
- **energyLevel**: NumberField - Energy rating 1-10
- **moodRating**: NumberField - Mood scale 1-10
- **stressLevel**: NumberField - Stress rating 1-10
- **sleepQuality**: NumberField - Sleep quality 1-10
- **notes**: MarkdownField - Free-form observations

### Vital Signs
- **weight**: NumberField - Body weight
- **bloodPressureSystolic**: NumberField - Systolic BP
- **bloodPressureDiastolic**: NumberField - Diastolic BP
- **heartRate**: NumberField - Resting heart rate
- **temperature**: NumberField - Body temperature
- **bloodGlucose**: NumberField - Blood sugar level
- **oxygenSaturation**: NumberField - SpO2 percentage
- **bodyFatPercentage**: NumberField - Body composition

### Symptoms Tracking
- **symptoms**: containsMany(Symptom) - Current symptoms
- **symptomSeverity**: contains(SeverityScale) - 1-10 intensity
- **symptomDuration**: StringField - How long experienced
- **symptomTriggers**: containsMany(Trigger) - Possible causes
- **painLocations**: containsMany(BodyPart) - Where pain occurs
- **painScale**: NumberField - Pain intensity 1-10
- **headaches**: contains(HeadacheLog) - Headache tracking

### Medications
- **medications**: containsMany(MedicationDose) - Taken today
- **missedDoses**: containsMany(MissedMedication) - Skipped meds
- **sideEffects**: containsMany(SideEffect) - Adverse reactions
- **supplements**: containsMany(Supplement) - Vitamins, herbs
- **doseTiming**: contains(MedicationSchedule) - When taken
- **effectiveness**: contains(EffectivenessRating) - How well working

### Physical Activity
- **exerciseType**: StringField - Activity performed
- **exerciseDuration**: NumberField - Minutes of activity
- **exerciseIntensity**: StringField - Light, moderate, vigorous
- **steps**: NumberField - Daily step count
- **activeMinutes**: NumberField - Minutes of activity
- **workoutDetails**: contains(WorkoutLog) - Specific exercises
- **recoveryTime**: NumberField - Rest between activities

### Nutrition & Hydration
- **meals**: containsMany(MealEntry) - Food consumed
- **waterIntake**: NumberField - Glasses/ounces of water
- **caloriesConsumed**: NumberField - Estimated calories
- **dietaryRestrictions**: containsMany(DietaryNote) - Special diets
- **supplementsNutrition**: containsMany(NutritionalSupplement) - Daily vitamins
- **alcoholConsumption**: NumberField - Drinks consumed
- **caffeineIntake**: NumberField - Mg of caffeine

### Sleep Tracking
- **bedtime**: TimeField - When went to bed
- **sleepTime**: TimeField - When fell asleep
- **wakeTime**: TimeField - When woke up
- **totalSleep**: NumberField - Hours slept (computed)
- **sleepInterruptions**: NumberField - Times woken up
- **sleepEnvironment**: contains(SleepConditions) - Room temp, noise
- **dreamRecall**: BooleanField - Remember dreams
- **sleepAids**: containsMany(SleepAid) - Melatonin, etc.

### Mental Health
- **anxietyLevel**: NumberField - Anxiety scale 1-10
- **depressionSymptoms**: containsMany(DepressionSymptom) - Mood indicators
- **cognitiveFunction**: NumberField - Mental clarity 1-10
- **socialInteractions**: NumberField - Social contact rating
- **gratitude**: MarkdownField - Things grateful for
- **mindfulness**: NumberField - Minutes of meditation
- **therapy**: contains(TherapySession) - Counseling notes

### Environmental Factors
- **weather**: contains(WeatherData) - Local conditions
- **airQuality**: NumberField - AQI index
- **allergies**: containsMany(AllergySymptom) - Seasonal reactions
- **location**: StringField - Where spent day
- **socialActivities**: containsMany(SocialEvent) - Group activities
- **workStress**: NumberField - Job stress level
- **homeEnvironment**: StringField - Living situation

## Required Component Cards

### Symptom Card
Create a separate Symptom card with:
- **symptomName**: StringField - Name of symptom
- **bodyPart**: StringField - Location on body
- **intensity**: NumberField - Severity 1-10
- **startTime**: DateTimeField - When began
- **duration**: StringField - How long lasted
- **triggers**: containsMany(StringField) - Possible causes
- **relief**: StringField - What helped
- **interference**: NumberField - Life impact 1-10
- **patterns**: StringField - Time of day, frequency

### MedicationDose Card
- **medicationName**: StringField - Drug name
- **dosage**: StringField - Amount taken
- **timesTaken**: containsMany(TimeField) - When taken
- **purpose**: StringField - What treating
- **prescriber**: StringField - Who prescribed
- **effectiveness**: NumberField - How well working 1-10
- **sideEffects**: containsMany(StringField) - Adverse effects
- **adherence**: BooleanField - Taken as prescribed

### MealEntry Card
- **mealType**: StringField - Breakfast, lunch, dinner, snack
- **foods**: containsMany(FoodItem) - What eaten
- **portion**: StringField - Amount consumed
- **calories**: NumberField - Estimated calories
- **satisfaction**: NumberField - How filling 1-10
- **digestiveReaction**: StringField - How felt after
- **location**: StringField - Where eaten
- **moodBefore**: NumberField - Hunger/mood before
- **moodAfter**: NumberField - Satisfaction after

## Computed Fields Logic

### Health Score
Weighted average of energy, mood, sleep quality, and exercise to create daily health score.

### Trend Analysis
Calculate 7-day and 30-day averages for key metrics to identify patterns.

### Medication Adherence
(Doses Taken / Doses Prescribed) Ã— 100 = Adherence percentage.

### Correlation Analysis
Identify relationships between symptoms, activities, and environmental factors.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design an intuitive health tracking interface:

**Header Section**
- Date selector with calendar navigation
- Overall wellness gauge (1-10 scale)
- Quick mood selector with emoji
- Today's summary stats
- Streak counters for habits

**Quick Entry Dashboard**
- **Vital Signs Panel**:
  - Weight scale input
  - Blood pressure fields
  - Heart rate entry
  - Temperature input
  - Quick measurement history
  
- **Mood & Energy**:
  - Slider controls for ratings
  - Emoji mood picker
  - Stress level gauge
  - Energy visualization
  - Quick notes field

**Detailed Tracking Sections**
- **Symptoms Tracker**:
  - Body diagram for pain locations
  - Symptom severity sliders
  - Duration selectors
  - Trigger identification
  - Photo attachments for rashes/injuries
  
- **Medication Log**:
  - Daily medication checklist
  - Dose confirmation
  - Side effect reporting
  - Effectiveness ratings
  - Missed dose tracking
  
- **Activity Monitor**:
  - Exercise type selector
  - Duration timer
  - Intensity picker
  - Step counter sync
  - Workout notes

**Analytics Dashboard**
- Health trend charts
- Correlation insights
- Progress toward goals
- Pattern recognition alerts
- Medication effectiveness graphs

### Mobile Health App View
- Swipe through daily sections
- Voice note recording
- Photo capture for symptoms
- Wearable device sync
- Medication reminders

### Weekly Summary View
- 7-day health overview
- Trend identification
- Goal progress
- Doctor visit preparation
- Sharable health reports

## Interactive Features

### Smart Reminders
- Medication time alerts
- Symptom check-ins
- Exercise prompts
- Water intake reminders
- Sleep time notifications

### Pattern Recognition
- Symptom trigger identification
- Sleep quality correlations
- Mood pattern analysis
- Medication effectiveness trends
- Exercise impact assessment

### Health Insights
- AI-powered observations
- Anomaly detection
- Recommendation engine
- Risk factor alerts
- Progress celebrations

## Styling Requirements
- Clean healthcare aesthetic
- Calming color palette
- Large touch targets
- High contrast readability
- Dark mode support
- Accessibility compliance
- Medical iconography
- Privacy-focused design

## Validation Rules
- Vital signs within realistic ranges
- Medication names verified
- Symptom descriptions required
- Date/time logical constraints
- Scale ratings 1-10 enforced
- Required vs. optional fields
- Photo attachment limits
- Privacy consent required

## Integration Points
- **Wearable Devices**: Fitbit, Apple Watch, Garmin
- **Health Apps**: Apple Health, Google Fit
- **Medical Devices**: Smart scales, BP monitors
- **Pharmacy**: Medication databases
- **Healthcare**: Electronic health records
- **Labs**: Test result imports
- **Fitness**: Workout app sync
- **Nutrition**: Food tracking apps
- **Mental Health**: Therapy platforms
- **Emergency**: Medical ID access

## Business Logic Requirements
- Automatic health scoring algorithms
- Trend analysis and forecasting
- Anomaly detection for urgent issues
- Medication interaction checking
- Symptom severity escalation
- Privacy and HIPAA compliance
- Data backup and recovery
- Emergency contact integration
- Healthcare provider sharing
- Research data contribution
- Goal setting and tracking
- Habit formation support
- Personalized recommendations
- Risk assessment modeling
